ltex.ignoreRuleInSentence.sentence: ^\QPeople subscribe to flush some of their ~~money~~ shit down the shithole every month.\E$
^\QContributors must not commit directly to the \EDummy[0-9]+\Q or \EDummy[0-9]+\Q branches.\E$
^\QContributors should ask for help when they get stuck.\E$
^\QContributors may build on top of other Contributors un-merged branches.\E$
^\QContributors may build on top of other Contributors unmerged branches.\E$
^\QMaintainers must ensure that all feedback provided to Contributors is specific, actionable, and kind.\E$
^\QMaintainers must not erase authorship information from any Contributors.\E$
^\QMaintainers should acknowledge Contributors issues and patches within two weeks of submission.\E$
